tool_description: word definition and related word in topic
title: definition topic

api_list.name: default
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://definition-topic.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "definition-topic.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
